ygData.subject: Re: Blast it!
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron looked straight at Firestrike, his hands on his hips. I am busy now Nightstrike. He then looked Firestrike with a stare that would crush a warship.

Megatron looked straight at Firestrike, his hands on his hips. "I am
busy now Nightstrike." He then looked Firestrike with a stare that would
crush a warship. "Then shoot me, shoot up the Decepticon cause, until I
came around the Decepticons were just a pipe dream, I built this maching
of conquest, SHOOT ME." he yelled.

Menasor looked on in confusion at what was happening, first at
Firestrike, then Megatron.
